title: Account email
body: Is there any way to find the signed-up email on my league account? Not the verified account. The email that have been used on register. Thank you!

replies.body: If you're ever having account issues or need to figure something out, your best bet is to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Once you're verified as the account creator, they'll be able to help with most anything!
